PHOTOS_TAB_GROUP_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: The Photos tab shows every photo in your library in all views. You can choose compact, summarized views for Collections and Years.
PHOTOSTREAM_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITLE_: Turning off Photo Stream will delete all Photo Stream photos from your iPad.
PHOTOSTREAM_NO_NETWORK_AIRPLANE_MODE: You cannot change Photo Stream settings because Airplane Mode is on.
SHAREDSTREAMS_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITL: Turning off Shared Photo Streams will delete all shared photos from your iPad.
HDR_TITLE_FOOTER_TEXT: HDR blends the best parts of three separate exposures into a single photo.
PHOTOSTREAM_GROUP_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION_WIF: Automatically upload new photos and send them to all of your iCloud devices when connected to Wi-Fi.
PLAYLIST_NOTE:
Music from iPod will automatically stop playing
if a playlist is selected
PHOTOSTREAM_NO_NETWORK_WIFI: You cannot change Photo Stream settings because you are not connected to the Internet.
SHAREDSTREAMS_GROUP_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION: Create photo streams to share with other people, or subscribe to other people's shared photo streams.
SHAREDSTREAMS_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITL: Turning off Shared Photo Streams will delete all shared photos from your iPod touch.
HDR_FOOTER_TEXT: Save the normally exposed photo in addition to the HDR version.
PHOTOSTREAM_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITLE_: Turning off Photo Stream will delete all Photo Stream photos from your iPhone.
SHAREDSTREAMS_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITL: Turning off Shared Photo Streams will delete all shared photos from your iPhone.
PHOTOSTREAM_TURN_OFF_CONFIRMATION_TITLE_: Turning off Photo Stream will delete all Photo Stream photos from your iPod touch.
PHOTOSTREAM_GROUP_FOOTER_DESCRIPTION_WLA: Automatically upload new photos and send them to all of your iCloud devices when connected to WLAN.
